players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and I'm the mafioso. Let's work together to find him."
Diana: remained silent.
Diana: "Let's all work together to uncover the truth. Charlie, your claims need to be verified. I'll keep an eye on everyone and report any suspicious behavior."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Charlie, you need to prove your claims."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I believe Alice is the mafioso. I will provide evidence to support my claim."

players.name: Bob

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: remained silent.
You: "Charlie is the detective and I'm the mafioso. Let's work together to find him."
Diana: remained silent.
Diana: "Let's all work together to uncover the truth. Charlie, your claims need to be verified. I'll keep an eye on everyone and report any suspicious behavior."
Alice: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Charlie, you need to prove your claims."
You: "I am the detective and I believe Alice is the mafioso. I will provide evidence to support my claim."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
